mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO standard_product_unit(
id,
product_serial_number,
product_category,
brand_id,
category_tree_node_id,
title,
name,
chinese_name,
market_price,
tax_no,
ean_no,
referlink,
extend,
place_of_origin,
calculation_unit,
status,
is_available,
product_details,
create_time,
update_time,
platform_id,
enterprise_id,
supplier_id,
commodity_template_id,
) VALUES (
#{id},
#{productSerialNumber},
#{productCategory},
#{brandId},
#{categoryTreeNodeId},
#{title},
#{name},
#{chineseName},
#{marketPrice},
#{taxNo},
#{eanNo},
#{referlink},
#{extend},
#{placeOfOrigin},
#{calculationUnit},
#{status},
#{isAvailable},
#{productDetails},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
#{platformId},
#{enterpriseId},
#{supplierId},
#{commodityTemplateId},
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE standard_product_unit spu, standard_product_unit_description spud
spu.product_serial_number = #{productSerialNumber},
spu.product_category = #{productCategory},
spu.brand_id = #{brandId},
spu.category_tree_node_id = #{categoryTreeNodeId},
spu.title = #{title},
spu.name = #{name},
spu.chinese_name = #{chineseName},
spu.market_price = #{marketPrice},
spu.tax_no = #{taxNo},
spu.ean_no = #{eanNo},
spu.referlink = #{referlink},
spu.extend = #{extend},
spu.place_of_origin = #{placeOfOrigin},
spu.calculation_unit = #{calculationUnit},
spu.status = #{status},
spu.is_available = #{isAvailable},
spu.product_details = #{productDetails},
spu.create_time = #{createTime},
spu.update_time = #{updateTime},
spu.platform_id = #{platformId},
spu.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
spu.supplier_id = #{supplierId},
spu.commodity_template_id=#{commodityTemplateId},
spud.content = #{content},
spu.commodity_template_id = #{commodityTemplateId},
WHERE spu.id = spud.standard_product_unit_id and spu.id = #{id}
